subject: Golf
lead_paragraph: Angela Stanford shot a six-under-par 66 in the second round of the Lorena Ochoa Invitational in Guadalajara, Mexico, and took a two-stroke lead over the L.P.G.A. Championship winner Yani Tseng. Stanford had a 10-under 134 total on the Guadalajara Country Club course. Tseng shot her second consecutive 68. Ochoa shot a 71; she is 10 strokes back.
